key_conclusion:
Um Girassol da Cor do Seu Cabelo is written in the key of G Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 3rd most popular key among Major keys and     the 3rd most popular  among all keys. Major keys, along with minor keys, are a common choice for popular songs.
